Text: {d}nin-ŋir₂-su ur-saŋ {d}en-lil₂-la₂-ra iri-ka-gen₆-na lugal ŋir₂-su{ki}-ke₄ an-ta-sur-ra e₂ he₂-ŋal₂ kalam-ma-ka-ni e₂ gal ti-ra-aš₂-ka-ni\abs mu-na-du₃ e₂ {d}ba-u₂\gen\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}ig-alim-ma-ra e₂-me-huš-gal-an-ki\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}šul-šag₄-ga-na-ra ki-tuš-akkil-le₂-ni\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}lama-sag₉-ga {ŋeš}igi-tab-ba-ni\dat e₂-ni\abs mu-na-du₃ šag₄-ba {d}za-za-ru₉ {d}ni₂-pa-e₃ {d}ur₂-nun-ta-e₃-a\dat e₂\abs mu-ne-ni-du₃ {d}nin-nisig ŋiri₂-la₂ {d}nin-ŋir₂-su-ka-ra e₂-ni\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}en-lilₓ(E₂)-la ad-da im-saŋ-ŋa₂-ka-ni\abs mu-na-du₃ {d}nanše\dat id₂ ki\abs aŋ₂-ŋa₂-ni id₂-niŋin₆{ki}-du\l2 al\abs mu-na-du₃ ka-ba\l1 e₂-ninnu\abs ni-du₃ kun-ba\l1 e₂-sirara₃{ki}\abs ni-du₃ {d}nin-ŋir₂-su-ra id₂ ki\abs aŋ₂-ŋa₂-ni {id₂}pa₅-{d}saman₃-kaš₄-ša₄\n5el3 al\abs mu-na-du₃ x BA AN x-x-ra x-dab₅-ba-a ud-ba lu₂ ma₂-lah₅-da-ke₄ ma₂\abs e-dab₅-ba-a\gen anše u₂-du-le udu\abs u₂-du-le e-dab₅-ba-a\gen {u₃-mu₂}u₂-mu₁₁\abs enku-re₆ e-dab₅-ba-a\gen še-gub-ba\abs gudu₄-ge-ne\erg ambar{ki}-a gala\abs he₂ lu₂-bappir₃\abs he₂ agrig\abs he₂ ugula\abs he₂ bar sila₄ gaba-ka-ka\n5al2 kug\abs a-ŋa₂-ŋa₂-a\gen dumu lagaš{ki}\gen saŋŋa GAR kiri₆ ama ukur₃-ra₂ nu-kurₓ(DU)-kurₓ(DU)\v10l1\v14sg3s ŋeš\abs na\l3 nu-ba-ni-degₓ(RI)-degₓ(RI) gi-lam\abs nu-ta-keše₂-re₆ addaₓ(|LU₂×BAD.BAD.A|) ki-mah-še₃ de₆\gen kaš-ni\abs 3(aš@c) dug ninda-ni\abs 1(geš₂@c) 2(u@c)-am₆ 1(aš@c) ŋeš-nu₂\abs 1(aš@c) maš saŋ-ŋa₂\gen\abs uruhₓ(|KUŠU₂.MUŠ₃|)-e ba-tumu₃ 1(aš@c) še-am₆ lu₂-umum-ma-ke₄ ba-tumu₃ e₂ ensi₂-ke₄ niŋ₂ ensi₂-ke₄ en-na tuku-a\gen {d}nin-ŋir₂-su lugal-bi\cop e₂ e₂-mi₂\erg niŋ₂ e₂-mi₂\erg en-na tuku-a\gen {d}ba-u₂ nin-bi\cop ninda ud-sa₂-ka-ni\abs 1(aš@c)-am₆ ninda ŋi₆-a-na-ka-ni\abs 6(aš@c)-am₆ 8(geš₂@c) ninda durunₓ(|KU.KU|)-na\abs ninda gub-ba-am₆ 4(u@c) ninda kum₂\abs ninda zu₂\abs gub-ba-am₆ 1(u@c) ninda kum₂\abs ninda banšur-ra-kam ninda lu₂ zig₃-ga-ka\abs 5(aš@c)-am₆ 4(geš₂@c) 1(u@c) ninda 1(aš@c) mudₓ(LAK449) kaš\abs nam um-ma-me 3(geš₂@c) ninda 1(aš@c) mudₓ(LAK449) kaš\abs |ABBA₂.IGI| niŋin₆{ki}-kam addirₓ(|PAD.DUG.GIŠ.SI|) a-bul₅-la\gen\abs nam-lugal ŋir₂-su{ki}\gen\abs šu\dat ba-ti-a ama-gi₄-bi\abs e-ŋar
